TopicTitle: I'm new, and have played KSP for almost a week now

Articles.Content:
I'm enjoying this game, a lot, and I was, yesterday, able to finally fly a manned rocket to the Mun (granted, not LAND on it.... more like crash into it).

I also see some good mods that'll help enhance my gameplay experience. I'll start posting when something comes up that I either can't figure out on my own, when I want to leave feedback/ideas, or update on a... sort of "Nuzlock" I do with my Kerbals on Career Mode.

Thank you.
Welcome to the forums, Dire_Squid! Feel free to ask anything and to leave your feedback.

Welcome to the forums, Dire_Squid! Feel free to ask anything and to leave your feedback.

Thank you, VintageXP.
Welcome! I don't really have anything else to add, so I'll just add this sentence to meet the minimum letter requirement.
